premise_source_doc_sentence: Fredric Mark `` Ric '' Edelman is the chairman and co-founder of Edelman Financial Services , LLC , the author of several personal finance books and the host of a weekly personal finance talk radio show called The Ric Edelman Show , syndicated by Syndicated Solutions .
